hero.title: FLUX Beambox II
hero.subtitle: Upgraded to a 55 W CO₂ laser so you can cut 20 mm acrylic and 18 mm Japanese cypress with studio-grade precision.

image.alt: Beambox II desktop laser cutter on a workbench.

highlight.title: 55 W CO₂ power
highlight.copy: Slice through 20 mm acrylic or 18 mm Japanese cypress while keeping fine details sharp.

highlight.title: 900 mm/s engraving
highlight.copy: Triple the throughput with smoother motion control for detailed patterns and production runs.

highlight.title: Expanded workspace
highlight.copy: 23.62" × 14.76" bed with up to 8.46" of Z-height when you add the extension pocket.

primaryBodyHtml: With engraving speeds of up to 900 mm/s, Beambox II triples throughput while keeping curves smooth and details crisp for both intricate artwork and production runs.

media.alt: Beambox II engraving at high speed.

secondaryBodyHtml: Beambox II is upgraded to a 55 W CO₂ laser so you can cut 20 mm acrylic and 18 mm Japanese cypress without sacrificing precision.
Bring bold ideas to life and swap between delicate engraving and deep cuts on a single machine.

slalom.heading: Larger working area, expanded creative space
slalom.headingHtml: Larger working area, expanded creative space
bodyHtml: Beambox II features a 23.62" × 14.76" work area and 4.92" of Z-height, expandable to 8.46" with the optional bottom tray. Stage larger panels or nest multiple jobs to finish more in a single run.

image.alt: Diagram of the Beambox II work area and Z-height options.

slalom.heading: Extension pocket add-on. Unlock thicker possibilities.
slalom.headingHtml: Extension pocket add-on. Unlock thicker possibilities.
bodyHtml: The extension pocket add-on opens 15.16" × 8.27" of working room with an 8.46" depth. It also supports the Chuck Rotary so you can engrave cylindrical or irregular objects just as easily.

image.alt: Beambox II extension pocket with rotary chuck in place.

slalom.heading: Passthrough, Beambox II makes it happen.
slalom.headingHtml: Passthrough, Beambox II makes it happen.
bodyHtml: Front and rear passthrough panels let you feed longer materials straight through the machine. No more trimming stock—just slide, align, and keep cutting.

image.alt: A long board passing through the Beambox II passthrough slot.

slalom.heading: Beam Studio automations that save time
slalom.headingHtml: Beam Studio automations that save time
bodyHtml: Auto Fit and Auto Arrange detect your material frame and one-click nest batches of small items.
Live camera preview and presets make it simple to drag, drop, and run without trial-and-error.

image.alt: Beam Studio showing auto-fit nesting on Beambox II.

slalom.heading: Wide-angle camera, LightBurn ready
bodyHtml: Seamlessly integrate with LightBurn’s camera preview system or keep designing in Beam Studio. The wide-angle camera gives accurate placement with a single tap, whichever software you prefer.

image.alt: Beambox II connected to LightBurn with camera preview.

slalom.heading: Built-in safety for every workspace
bodyHtml: Certified to CE, FCC, and FDA standards and compliant with IEC60825-1 plus SGS tested for extra assurance.
A full metal enclosure pauses jobs when the lid opens, a side emergency stop halts instantly, and seven flame sensors trigger alarms if heat is detected.
Pair with Beam Air Pro’s triple-layer filtration—pre-filter, HEPA, and activated carbon—to keep your studio air clean.

image.alt: Beambox II with the lid closed showing the enclosed metal chassis.
